attributes.action: Take legal against and prosecute those MP's found guilty of making fraudulent expenses claims over the last 10 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hold a full public enquiry of mp expenses claims over the last 10 years and prosecute those found guilty of making fraudulent claims.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
